backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report structure containing an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint with a root div and script loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component wrapping the app with TaskerProvider and rendering AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout controlling active section rendering and applying theme settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Sidebar navigation component with mobile and desktop variants and section switching.
frontend/src/features/achievements/Achie: Achievements dashboard showing weekly analytics, charts, and metrics with empty state handling.
frontend/src/features/achievements/compo: Recharts donut chart visualizing completed versus pending tasks.
Recharts bar chart showing daily task completion trends for the week.
frontend/src/features/calendar/CalendarS: Calendar view allowing date selection, day creation, and viewing tasks for the selected date.
frontend/src/features/calendar/component: Renders tasks for a selected study day with progress, task list, and actions to toggle or delete tasks.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Shows a collapsible card for each study day including progress, tasks, and task creation form.
Provides a form to create a new task with subject, chapter, type, priority, reward, xp, and notes.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Displays the dashboard with study days, streak info, and controls to add or reset days.
frontend/src/features/pomodoro/PomodoroS: Implements a Pomodoro timer with modes, durations, task selection, and timer controls.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsS: Allows users to customize theme settings including dark mode, accent color, and background image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and loads persisted identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistedTaskerSta: Loads, normalizes, migrates, and persists the Tasker app state in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePomodoroTimer.ts: Runs the Pomodoro countdown, handles completion logging, and exposes start/pause/reset controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeSettings.ts: Applies theme settings such as dark mode, accent colors, and background images to the document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeeklyAnalytics.ts: Computes weekly task stats including totals, daily data, and subject breakdowns from stored days.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for theming, including light/dark modes and layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/state/storageKeys.ts: Defines legacy and current storage key names for state persistence.
frontend/src/state/TaskerProvider.tsx: Manages global Tasker state, updates days and tasks, handles pomodoro and theme updates, and persists changes.
frontend/src/state/taskerTypes.ts: Defines tasker-related TypeScript types and constants, including tasks, subjects, pomodoro settings, theme settings, and chapter lists.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates unique task IDs using crypto.randomUUID with a timestamp-based fallback.
frontend/src/utils/storageKeys.ts: Duplicate storage key definitions for legacy and current state keys.
frontend/src/utils/taskerLogic.ts: Provides task sorting, progress calculation, date utilities, and engagement streak logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, plugins, colors, typography, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, issues, and pending feature requests including export option and file reduction.
